<s>unless the callosal fibres are produced in the 
embryonic brain <\s>. In regard to the gyrus fornicatus 
of course part of it anteriorly comes to be included 
in this region, and <s>in regard to <\s> of its fibres I am 
disposed to believe that only a small number,
if any, really <s>pass in <\s> become callosal. I regard 
them rather as passing from front to back 
of the brain constituting <s>[text?]<\s> what is generally 
regarded as a commissure of the brain. I will 
not, however, in the present instance hazard any 
definite statement in regard to them. I hope 
shortly to be able to say something more <s>about 
these more <\s> definite in relation <s>regard <\s> to this subject.
<s>[The tractus externus & medius coalesce as seen 
in Figs.      and out of the two is produced 
a broad single tract (      ) wh: I shall name 
the <u>conjoined band <\u>. This it must be remembered 
is not the inner capsule but is the tract <\s>
